|brand = WRTnode |model = 7 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (MT7697) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 02/14/2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/WRTnode_7 |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = mini module, IoT board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2ALR4-WRTNODE7 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7697; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-M4F |cpu1spd = 192 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = MediaTek;MT7697;onchip; |flash2size = 64 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 KiB |ram1chip = MediaTek;MT7697;onchip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot |stockos = Linux;FreeRTOS;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 3.3 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.3 |pwr_conn = SD
|serial = yes,, 2x UART,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.2 LE |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.8.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/12/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = WRTnode 7 |rad1modif = SD (40-pin) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7697; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|LinkIt 7697|LinkIt Smart 7688}}
====[[WRTnode 7]]==== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7697 @192MHz :(ARM Cortex-M4 w/ FPU) • [http://7.wrtnode.cc Spec.] *Flash: 32Mbite (NOR), RAM: 352KB (SRAM) *WLAN: 802.11bgn 2.4GHz (150Mbps) :Bluetooth 4.2 BLE (WiFi/BLE/MCU) *I/O: 2x UART, SPI (master/slave), 2x I2C, I2S, :4x ADC (12bit), 28x GPIO, 28x PWM (40-pin) *Power: 3.3V, Temp: -35~85℃, OS: FreeRTOS *Dimensions: 23 x 18 mm
==Links of Interest== [https://github.com/WRTnode WRTnode GitHub] :[http://wiki.wrtnode.com/index.php?title=Main_Page WRTnode 1 Wiki] {{•}} [http://wiki.wrtnode.cc/index.php?title=首页/en WRTnode 2 Wiki]
*FCC-ID: [https://fccid.io/2ALR4-WRTNODE7 2ALR4-WRTNODE7] (2017-06-12) :[https://fccid.io/2ALR4-WRTNODE7/User-Manual/User-Manual-3422462 Datasheet] • [https://www.seeedstudio.com/LinkIt-7697-p-2818.html ''SeeedStudio'' LinkIt 7697]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2015/08/17/wrtnode2p-wrtnode2r-and-wrtnodehi-openwrt-boards-to-feature-m-2-mini-pcie-edge-connectors-h-265-camera-support-and-more/ ''WRTnode Boards'' on '''CNX-Software''']
